text: Augustin Pajou (19 September 1730 - 8 May 1809) was a French sculptor. He is known for his portraits of celebrities. ==Biography== Augustin Pajou was born in Paris. He studied sculpture with Jean-Baptiste Lemoyne the Younger. At the age of 18, he wins the Prix de Rome. Category:1730 births Category:1809 deaths Category:French sculptors
title: Augustin Pajou
